page.title: 12ST.IVES HARBOUR
page.content: The harbour is great.There's always something happening around it. You can have a{swim}, or just sunbathe on the {sand}.If you are daring ,or daft , you can jump and dive off the pier. If you are a 'visitor ' you could take a boat {trip}or even hire a 'self drive' boat. When the 'maroons' go off everyone rushes to watch the{lifeboat}being launched from from its trailer.The Salvation Army{band}doesn't play on the slipway then. There's always the{Arcade}where all the kids meet.In winter it's about the only thing open.Then most of the small boats have been laid up and only the keenest{anglers}fish from the pier.The few bigger boats bob up and down impatiently waiting to go to sea and the old fishermen sit snugly in their {lodges}talking of better days.
